Author: bitterviaproxy
Text: I'm totally the same. I always think 'I'll lay off once I get to XY kg but then I get too scared about how I'm going to maintain the weight loss. All of my attempts to go onto a 'maintenance' diet just seem to fail...

Author: donout_disturb
Text: Same.  I told myself that when I would reach my GW I would treat myself with a chocolate bar I bought like one month ago and eat 100-200 cals more a day.  Lo and behold I reached it on Thursday, actually I was one pound lighter than that, and I still haven't ate that chocolate bar.  I've set a new gw.  I'm not eating more.  Wonderful, right?
